name: CalmLine
description:
In this 2D platformer, you pave the way for an uncontrolled astronaut through tricky and skill-demanding obstacles to the unthinkable truth.

FEATURES
    - Hand-drawn graphic style
    - Special ambience sound and music composition for every chapter
    - More than 50 levels with different conditions
    - Unique laser system
    - Limited time as the basis of complexity
